subtasks.name: Understand AI Regulation Requirements
subtasks.description: Review and comprehend the key elements of the RAISE act, focusing on transparency requirements, employee rights, and obligations.
subtasks.notes: This is foundational for compliance; ensure to document findings.

subtasks.name: Develop AI Training Protocols
subtasks.description: Create training protocols for employees on the responsible use of AI models as per the regulation.
subtasks.notes: Consider consulting an HR professional for effective training.

subtasks.name: Implement Transparency Measures
subtasks.description: Establish measures to ensure transparency in AI model training and usage, including documentation and reporting.
subtasks.notes: May require technical assistance to set up proper documentation.

subtasks.name: Conduct Employee Rights Training
subtasks.description: Train employees on their rights and obligations under the RAISE act.
subtasks.notes: Important for maintaining a compliant workplace environment.

subtasks.name: Establish Compliance Monitoring
subtasks.description: Develop a system for ongoing monitoring and compliance checks related to AI usage.
subtasks.notes: Consider a simple software solution for tracking compliance.

key_risks: Lack of understanding of complex AI regulations may lead to non-compliance.
Insufficient training may result in misuse of AI technologies by employees.

subtasks.description: Draft policies outlining employee rights and obligations concerning AI use.
subtasks.notes: HR expertise is crucial to ensure compliance with employee rights.

subtasks.description: Organize training sessions for employees on AI safety and compliance with the new regulations.
subtasks.notes: Training is key to ensure that employees understand their roles under the new regulations.

subtasks.name: Monitor and Audit AI Practices
subtasks.description: Implement an ongoing monitoring and auditing process for AI usage to ensure compliance with the RAISE act.
subtasks.notes: Requires technical expertise to set up effective monitoring systems.

key_risks: Non-compliance with AI regulations leading to potential fines.
Insufficient training may result in misuse of AI technologies.
